name: Drop Down: Christmas Coming
description:
This is new game for you to relax yourseld in Christmas Event.
This game is simple. You need to touch on the Christmas items in the bottom which have the similar stone with the bottom Christmas item on the left line.

With 3 difficult mode for you which have more type of fast Christmas item that you need to touch, you will have a good time with your phone.

Bonus: If the left Christmas item and the right Christmas item are the same, you can have double score when touch on the right Christmas item button. The Christmas item on the right column is only got by this method.

NOW CHRISTMAS TIME IS COMING, JUST PLAY YOUR GAME.
